talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're really a special voe, aren't you?


You must truly adore Lady Riju if you were
willing to travel through the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff>.

<snd:Think>I wish I had a voe like you in my life.


<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>I thought I could turn my back
on past loves and focus on finding the
perfect voe for me...
But that <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff> really put a damper
on my motivation.

Talk about being unlucky in love.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>I don't think I've got any happiness left
to drive away... <sp:5:0:0>*sigh*

<sp:0:2:2:5000>...Oops.<sp:5:0:0> I sighed again.<sp:0:2:2:6400>

around until it comes back to you!

I charged into my last relationship without
really giving it any thought. I think that's
why it failed.
But I won't do that again! I'm going to
find a good voe, be my best self, and
be happy!
<snd:TalkPositive>To pull that off, I've really got to pay
attention in class!
